target.rawSql:
SELECT
    start_date AS time,
    'Round ' || round_id AS text,
    '' AS tags
FROM round
WHERE $__timeFilter(start_date)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    player.last_seen_user_name,
    COUNT(server_ban.banning_admin) AS ban_count
FROM 
    player
LEFT JOIN 
    server_ban
ON 
    player.user_id = server_ban.banning_admin
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ban_time)
GROUP BY 
    player.user_id, 
    player.last_seen_user_name
ORDER BY 
    ban_count DESC;

SELECT
    server_ban.reason,
    player1.last_seen_user_name AS player_user_name,
    player2.last_seen_user_name AS banning_admin_name
FROM
    server_ban
JOIN
    player AS player1 ON server_ban.player_user_id = player1.user_id
JOIN
    player AS player2 ON server_ban.banning_admin = player2.user_id
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(server_ban.ban_time)
ORDER BY 
    server_ban.ban_time DESC;

SELECT 
    DATE(ban_time) AS ban_date, 
    COUNT(*) AS ban_count
FROM 
    server_ban
WHERE 
    reason LIKE '%raid%'
GROUP BY 
    ban_date
ORDER BY
ban_date
DESC LIMIT 50
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Amount", species AS "Species" FROM profile GROUP BY species ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Amount", sex AS "Sex" FROM profile GROUP BY sex

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN age < 20 THEN 'Under 20'
    WHEN age >= 20 AND age < 30 THEN '20-29'
    WHEN age >= 30 AND age < 40 THEN '30-39'
    WHEN age >= 40 AND age < 60 THEN '40-59'
    ELSE '60+'
  END AS age_group,
  COUNT(*) AS count
FROM profile
GROUP BY age_group
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Count", trait_name AS "Trait" FROM trait GROUP BY trait_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN last_read_rules IS NOT NULL THEN 'Read Rules'
        ELSE 'Used fuckrules'
    END AS read_rules_status,
    COUNT(*) AS player_count
FROM 
    player
WHERE 
    last_seen_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '15 days'
GROUP BY 
    read_rules_status;
SELECT COUNT(player_id) AS "Unique Players" FROM player

list.definition: SELECT round_id AS __text, round_id AS __value FROM round WHERE round_id >= 1728 ORDER BY start_date desc
list.label: Round
list.name: round_id
list.query: SELECT round_id AS __text, round_id AS __value FROM round WHERE round_id >= 1728 ORDER BY start_date desc

list.definition: SELECT COALESCE(MIN(start_date), NOW()) FROM round WHERE start_date > (SELECT start_date FROM round WHERE round_id = ${round_id})
list.name: end_date
list.query: SELECT COALESCE(MIN(start_date), NOW()) FROM round WHERE start_date > (SELECT start_date FROM round WHERE round_id = ${round_id})

list.definition: SELECT start_date FROM round WHERE round_id = ${round_id}
list.name: start_date
list.query: SELECT start_date FROM round WHERE round_id = ${round_id}
